Interface Banner

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DataSerializable, TileEntity

    public interface Banner
extends TileEntity
    Represents a Banner.

    • Nested Class Summary

      static interface  Banner.PatternLayer
      A representation on a single layer of a Banner's pattern.
